page.title: 15A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: When I got up I got dressed to go to school,then I had cornflakes for breakfast. Then I played with things by myself. At 10 to 9 I went to school When I got there I talked to Jason and Gavin then we went into the classroom.We went into assembly and sang a hymn and talked about helping each other,then we said a prayer. Then we went back to our classroom and did our work. At 10.30 we went out to play. After this we did written work. At 12.00 we had lunch then half an hour for playtime. At 1.00 we went in and did some painting. After afternoon playtime we had a story and went home at 3.15. When I got home I had some soda-stream and a biscuit,then I went to play snooker with Adam and I won.I went home and had scrambled eggs for tea.After tea I watched Emmerdale Farm,Brookside and went to bed at 9.30
